conversation.Name: Female 1
conversation.Text: Excuse me, sir. Can you please tell us why the train is delayed?

conversation.Name: Female 2
conversation.Text: Yes, we have been waiting for quite some time now.

conversation.Name: Female 1
conversation.Text: Do you have any information on when the train will arrive?

conversation.Name: Male Conductor
conversation.Text: I apologize for the inconvenience. There was a technical issue that caused the delay. The train should be here in about 15 minutes.

conversation.Name: Female 2
conversation.Text: Thank you for letting us know. We appreciate the update.
